  • Build ROI calculators and commercials models to assist the partner in their commercial decision.

  • Gather key commercial, technical and contractual requirements as part of the closing and onboarding process.

  • Working closely with Implementation and Customer Success Managers to assist with successful customer launches

  • Evaluating your own process and the wider teams and continually feeding back to iterate and refine the sales process.

  • Ensure CRM, sales notes, and reporting data is clean, precise and up to date.


Requirements



  • 4-6 years enterprise SaaS or PaaS B2B sales experience.

  • Proven track record of selling to mid-market and enterprise customers with minimum contract values of £20k per annuum.

  • Proven record of delivering month-on-month sales growth, with a decreasing sales cycle and an increasing close rate.


What’s in for you?


We believe there is a clear distinction between perks and benefits. Perks are easily replicable, whereas benefits are something that are unique to us. We have taken the time to tailor a number of them to fit our culture and ethos.


Compensation



  • £40-60k basic salary

  • £40-60k annual performance bonus (paid quarterly based on objectives)


Benefits



  • Pay reviews every 6 months to make sure we’re paying market rate.

  • Participation in the Employee Options pool so you get to own a piece of WeGift.

  • Pension scheme (3% contribution)

  • A minimum of 25 days holiday + bank holidays (we’re not too descriptive about holidays so if you need more time off then just ask).

  • Staff perks with WeGift brands - discounts of up to 12% on coffee, weekly groceries, holidays, the list is endless.

  • Flexible hours and work from home when needed - yes, yes everyone says this but we do.

  • WeRecognise, where we shine the spotlight on exceptional employees every month who in turn get a £200 award in the eGift card of their choice.

  • Personal development budget - well actually there is no budget as we don’t believe in putting a cap on learning new things.

  • Generous maternity and paternity packages to make sure you get to spend time with your new bundle of joy.

  • Fully licensed as a tier 2 sponsor + relocation packages to help you get settled in.


Perks



  • Brand new We Work office based in Monument, London.

  • A new laptop as standard - no one wants an old one when they need to be doing their best work + all the trimmings you need to get the perfect work setup.

  • Catered lunch once a week.

  • Monthly team socials (Escape Rooms, Karaoke - everyone gets a chance to choose what this looks like)

  • Cycle to work scheme - save some £££ on buying a bike


 


We are an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, colour, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.


 


Successful candidates will be contacted within two weeks.

items.title: Toggl: Sales Account Executive
items.content:
Sales Account Executive

Toggl is an easy to use and flexible time tracking tool that helps 3+ million users see where their work time goes, so they can focus on the projects that really matter. It also works on all your devices, and integrates with over a 100 tools. 

We are looking for a savvy Account Executive to help kick-start our Sales team.

The role
As an Account Executive, you will help us build an Inside Sales team that would educate our customers about the value of Toggl in a thoughtful way. You will learn about the clients’ business needs and service usage patterns and then provide recommendations for our product development. You will drive the sales process with prospective customers as well as expansion within existing accounts. In this role, you will assist defining, building and monitoring repeatable and scalable processes for upselling Toggl to 20+ user teams on the Premium plan. Our Marketing and Product teams will give you strong support for proactively improving product experience and conversion rates. In order to track success, you will set up analytics and KPIs relevant for the new team. 

About you
You will succeed in this role if you have a results-driven mindset and a strong drive to achieve goals. You have at least 3 years of experience with closing deals on the scale of at least 10k$, preferably in a SaaS business. You also have experience in leading a team of at least 5 people. You have strong executive abilities and are not scared of experimentation and changing direction. Starting new tactical initiatives excites you and you are able to explain your plans in business terms as well as create workflow specs for the team. You have excellent written and spoken English. Experience working remotely and understanding the remote culture is a plus.

About our team
Toggl is a distributed team of 80+ people working remotely from 30 countries. We take pride in our professional, learning-oriented and friendly working environment that values work-life balance and constantly doing our best in every aspect of our work. You can work from anywhere in the world, because we know great people do awesome work wherever they are. Every few months we travel to meet up somewhere in the world and spend some quality time together. Our business is profitable with a healthy margin and we’re built with no outside investments, so you can count on a stable working environment.

Some benefits
  • Freedom to choose when and where you work from.
  • 28 calendar days of paid time off a year, plus your local holidays.
  • 2 company retreats plus 2 team meetups a year (expenses covered) for team-building.
  • Laptop and a €2,000 budget to set up your home office.
  • Reimbursement for co-working space rent or internet service at home.
  • Opportunities to attend trainings, workshops or conferences.
  • Monthly reimbursement for gym membership, massage and other things to improve your health.
  • Support for buying a phone, eyeglasses or tools you need for doing your best work.

The salary for this position is 60,000 USD annually.

Apply now!
All it takes to apply is answering a short skills test that assesses your expertise. Please note that only candidates who take the test will be considered.

Free Toggl t-shirt for those who do well on the test!

items.title: Sales Associate
items.content:
DESCRIPTION


£25-35k pa base salary, £40-65k 1st Year OTE


Hubble is one of the UK’s leading PropTech startups and is changing the face of commercial property. Our mission is to find the perfect home for every company and we’ve built an online platform to help businesses rent, manage and share office space. We are now on the lookout for our next sales superstar to join our rapidly growing sales team.


We are looking for an experienced sales professional who can support our clients with their office search by making recommendations, answering questions, arranging viewings, negotiating with office providers, and ultimately making sure they find and book the best space for them. This is an excellent opportunity to work in an established but fast growing team of successful sales professionals.




 


REQUIREMENTS



  • At least one year of commercial sales or account management experience

  • Strong track record of achieving and exceeding sales targets

  • Ideally experience of working for a technology company or startup

  • Know your way around London

  • Well developed negotiation, presentation, and communication skills with strong consultative sales approach

  • Ability to organise and prioritise your workload independently

  • Ability to work in a fast-paced and fluctuating environment and willingness to learn new tools




 


BENEFITS


We make sure everyone in the team is comfortable and has the best environment for them. We offer flexible hours, remote working and have a relaxed attitude to taking holiday - focusing only on whether work gets done. Benefits are optional and can be tweaked on an individual basis depending on what makes you most productive. Here are some of the things we offer:



  • Remuneration competitive with industry and level of experience.

  • Bonus based on sales generated.

  • Equity options.

  • Macbook, and peripherals.

  • Expense budget & travel.

  • Noise-cancelling headphones.

  • Spotify Premium or Apple Music.

  • Kindle Unlimited + free technical books.

  • Health & Pension.

  • Cycle to Work scheme.


2018 Winner of Property Week’s ‘Best Company to Work For’ – Role Satisfaction, Culture and Communication, Relationship with Supervisor, Training and Development


Additionally, being part of Entrepreneur First, 500 startups and Seedcamp gives us (and you) access to a vibrant startup community, office hours and talks with industry experts.


We truly value our people and company culture. Want to know more about why Hubble is a great place to work? Check out this recent blog post.

items.title: Prospect: Sales Executive
items.content:
Sales Executive


ABOUT THE ROLE

This unique role is a blend of the traditional Sales Development (“SDR”) and Account Executive (“AE”) roles. 

In the first 3 months, you will:

  • Source new leads (using Prospect )

  • Send cold emails and make calls

  • Schedule meetings for a seasoned sales rep on the team

Once you’re fully ramped up, in the next 3 months you are expected to:

  • Consistently meet quota of booking 25 meetings per month

  • Start doing your own sales calls and demos

Once you’ve grown into the role, your final responsibilities will be:

  • Finding your own prospects

  • Booking meetings with them

  • Negotiating and closing deals

If you’re looking for challenges to grow or have entrepreneurial dreams, this is an excellent role for you to get exposure to working with VPs, Directors, and C-level decision makers.

We’ve set this “full stack sales” role up this way so that you’re always growing and exposed to new challenges instead of being forced into one very specific responsibility. 

ABOUT YOU

You are always learning. You believe that the only way to grow is to be independent and always be learning. Prior experience at a startup or SaaS company is highly preferred.

You genuinely enjoy helping and talking to people. You realize that sales is about building authentic long-term relationships. You must have prior sales or SDR experience that shows this.

Your are creative and tech savvy. You realize that your prospects get flooded with cold emails and you look for ways to stand out from the crowd. Experience with outbound software (Outreach.io, Salesloft) and other sales tech (GoVideo, Cirrus Insight) is a big plus!

You focus on quality over quantity. You believe that it is better to write ten high quality cold emails versus one hundred cookie-cutter emails.

You don’t make excuses. You realize that there will always be objections and you get a thrill from dealing with them.

ABOUT US

We started in 2014 with three founders. We are currently a hybrid-remote team of 12 people that is spread over 6 different cities worldwide.

We’re fully independent and bootstrapped with $0 raised from VCs or investors. We did this so we can focus on the two things that matter the most: our customers and our team.

Every customer we have today was sourced using our own product (Prospect) or via word-of-mouth. Our sales team is very small (< 3 people) and you will work very closely with our CEO on a regular basis.

COMPENSATION, BENEFITS, AND PERKS

The salary for this role is $80,000 Canadian dollars (OTE; $40,000 base, $40,000 commission). This will be adjusted as you start doing your own meetings and start closing deals.

You can choose to work from our Kitchener-Waterloo office, entirely remote (any country), or a blend of both. You are encouraged to work where you perform best.

We believe that you should have good equipment to do your work and we give a laptop of your choice once you’re up and running.

We give ample time off. Everyone gets 4 weeks paid-time-off. Additionally, we work four-day workweeks every July and August. We also offer a generous vacation allowance.

If you are authorized to work in Canada, we will also give you health benefits under our company HSA. If you decide to work from the office, you will also get daily catered lunches.

WHAT’S NEXT

If this sounds like something you would like to be a part of, we would love to hear from you!

We usually get hundreds of job applicants and we read through every single one of them. We highly recommend applying with a good cover letter if you would like to stand out.

Within two weeks of applying, you will hear from us if you’ve made it to the next stage which will be a quick culture screening. You will then have an hour long call with the team. After that, you will proceed to the final stage of interviews which will be specific to the role and then to the final offer.

items.content:
Environmental Sciences Sales Representative at Beta Analytics

Remote | International
Job Description
Company Description

Beta Analytic is looking for self-motivated individuals to help assist in our customer service and business development efforts with current and potential US clients, which include universities, scientific researchers and businesses. Communications are over the phone and via email as well as periodic attendance at conferences. The candidates must be available during US business hours.

Excellent command / highly proficient in spoken and written English is required.

Role and Responsibilities

Business Development / Prospecting

  • Contribute to the growth of your local region in terms of samples and new clients
  • Contribute to strategy & adapt global sales strategy to your local region
  • Obtain and follow up on referrals from cold calls and conversations with clients
  • Prospecting activities
  • Represent Beta at conferences
  • Monitor news, tenders and national projects and follow up accordingly

Account Management

  • Build relationships with key contacts to develop business at major accounts in your region
  • Use data analysis to track sample submittal trends – follow up with clients to resolve any issues and fill up the pipeline
  • Gather market intel (industry trends, competitors, regulations) and report to management/follow up with prospects accordingly

Customer Support and Consultation

  • Take care of incoming inquiries/emails
  • Follow up on results
  • Escalate recommendations for improvement in processes and user interface based on customer experience

Other

  • Effective management of productivity, goals, workload and schedule
  • Stay up-to-date with research fields, Beta resources and technical developments in the lab and industry
Account Manager – Skill Set
  • Discipline, autonomy, motivation, and drive
  • Accountability: true to word, takes action and accepts responsibility
  • Effective at Initiating / Maintaining relationships and building mutual trust
  • Can engage a prospect and lead decision-making process
  • Intellectual curiosity and grasp of technical topics
  • Good communicator with a highly professional manner – telephone and email
  • Consultative style / customer service orientation
  • Demonstrates logical thinking and problem-solving skills
  • Can follow processes and accepts direction
  • Adaptability: Open to challenge, growth, change
  • Positive outlook and can do attitude

This is a remote position.

For more information on our company please go to www.radiocarbon.com and www.betalabservices.com

Please send your resume and cover letter in English.

Hourly: $14 + commission structure + monthly bonus + quarterly bonus to equate approximately $40,000+ yearly.

items.title: Senior Sales Executive
items.content:
Senior Sales Executive at SmartBug Media

Remote

(Telecommute)

  • Boston, MA
  • Full Time
  • Sales & Marketing
  • Experienced

Are you looking for a sales role that will enable you to hone your craft at a fast growing digital agency in an exploding segment of the market? Are you competitive and self-motivated with previous sales and marketing experience? Our high-producing team is poised for explosive growth and we’re looking for an enthusiastic sales professional to help us achieve our goals.

We’re building a different kind of work environment at SmartBug Media – one where you can deliver great results, have a great time with people you respect and still embrace the things that matter in life. We focus on development and growth.

Position Overview:

SmartBug’s Senior Sales Executive will report to the VP of Sales and Marketing and will be responsible for executing our inbound sales methodology, properly forecasting sales numbers for new accounts, and achieving quotas each quarter across our five core lines of business: inbound marketing and paid media, website design, sales enablement, and public relations.

The Day-to-Day:

  • Showcase your expertise in inbound marketing and inbound sales.
  • Close new business consistently at or above quota level.
  • Manage all aspects of the sales funnel, from qualification to close.
  • Employ (and contribute to the evolution of) SmartBug’s existing inbound sales process.
  • Conduct needs assessments calls with sales qualified leads.
  • Respond to sales inquiries via email and phone as assigned.
  • Leverage HubSpot’s entire Sales Hub, demonstrating inbound selling methodology through each sales interaction.
  • Optimize dashboards and reporting for sales leadership.
  • Monitor performance against key performance indicators and implement improvement strategies, as required.
  • Contribute as a sales and marketing thought leader as an author for SmartBug’s own blog.
  • Become a true evangelist of SmartBug’s employee advocacy program
  • Share your inbound sales knowledge by contributing to the SmartBug blog and webinar series.
  • Rock the future customer experience by demonstrating your inbound expertise to identify pains and architect solutions that are best for the customer’s business needs.
  • Other responsibilities as assigned
  • Have fun and make some great friends!

Experience and Education Requirements:

  • Authorization to work in the U.S. without employer sponsorship is required
  • Minimum 3 years experience running a consultative sales process or delivering consultative marketing strategy, preferably a B.A. or B.S. degree in related field
  • The desire to meet and exceed quotas for all of SmartBug’s lines of business.
  • Working knowledge of CRM best practices and sales enablement tools.
  • Superior communication skills, whether on video conference, phone calls, in-person, or written communication.
  • The ability to assess business problems and prescribe solutions as they relate to sales and marketing initiatives for our clients.
  • An innate hunger and the self-discipline to grow, as well as a willingness to help others succeed.
  • Alignment with our values
  • Inbound marketing, inbound sales, HubSpot marketing, and HubSpot sales certifications preferred.
  • Experience working in a fast-paced, startup-like environment.
  • Experience selling marketing services.
  • Experience purchasing marketing services and/or managing agency relationships as a client.
  • Experience working remotely preferred
  • Ability to travel at least 1x per year to our annual conference

Interview Process:

  • Application submission
  • Video application submission
  • Phone screen with HR
  • Video call with hiring team
  • Reference checking
  • Final video interview with SmartBug’s CEO

Our Extensive Employee Benefits Program Includes:

  • Generous compensation package with performance incentives
  • Health insurance with company contribution
  • Paid maternity and paternity leave
  • Paid vacation
  • Paid time off
  • 401(k) with employer matching
  • Flexible spend plan
  • Company-funded short-term disability and life insurance
  • Long-term disability
  • Annual leadership conference, SmartBugapalooza
  • Training budget
  • The flexibility of working remotely

About SmartBug Media™
SmartBug Media™ is a globally recognized Intelligent Inbound™ marketing agency that assists businesses in growing revenue through content marketing, sales enablement, web development, marketing automation, and PR. For more than 10 years, SmartBug™ has helped businesses increase qualified leads, close customers, and enhance the reach and loyalty of their brands. We’re one of a handful of HubSpot Diamond partners in the world, the highest-rated agency in the history of the HubSpot ecosystem, and were named HubSpot’s Global Partner of the Year in 2018. With five Comparably awards won in 2018 and certification as a “Great Place to Work” for the second year in a row, it’s clear that it’s not just our clients that like us.

Apply for job

items.title: Business Development Officer at Oasis Living
tags: DBG:surround``OR(locat, base, resid) 3W OR(berlin, london, pari)
items.content:
Please note we do not sponsor work permit.


You must be entitled to work in the UK.


No agencies please.


Job Title: Business Development Role in Oasis Living. 


Hours: Full Time


Joining: Start Immediately/We can wait up to 1 months


Location: Edpsace London, Shoreditch


Hobby programmers and fresh graduates with 2y+ of personal programming/hacking experience welcome


About us


Oasis Living is a tech and data-driven property & lifestyle hospitality for the millennials. We use technology at every step to vet and find high-quality tenants, and manage our housekeeping & property maintenance services, ensuring low churn, achieve near zero void periods and preserve property value.


A successful business running for 4 years, we manage over 60 properties in London & Surrey and looking to expand in UK and internationally after having proven the model over a few business cycles


 


About the founder


Sam Ghosh is a London-based tech-entrepreneur and founder of Oasis Living


Sam co-founded Earthmiles as a cto. Earthmiles focuses on health-rewards and incentives (https://earthmiles.co.uk/)


Currently also a Partner at Gattaca, an algorithmic trading firm, specializing in cryptocurrencies.


Prior to that, Sam worked in banking/hedge funds for over 10 years between London and Hong Kong, and then joined a city-based fund with colleagues from Societe Generale ( http://www.voltairecap.com/).


Linkedin – https://www.linkedin.com/in/sam7/


 


Your Role


We are looking for a versatile business development officer, a jack-of-many-trades who will work very closely each day with the Founder and expand the business in UK


Key requirements are:



  • High level of excel proficiency – Your job will involve dealing extensively with excel spreadsheets and Airtable, and you should be familiar. You know concpets of corporate finance – discounted. As a guidance you should be able to produce excel sheets similar to this example, over multiple tabs/worksheets and with inputs, outputs clearly defined and formatted from the start https://www.evernote.com/l/ABFqGujJyLdKl7G0Bdsfq0CAcGGp5nmpqQ8

  • High level of Powerpoint skills – You will be required to make a lot of presentations and variations of the same pitch for various investors and clients, in a very clear, professional format. You will use the company pitchbook templates and extend it for your purpose

  • Familiarity with Corporate and Real Estate Law – Familiarity with corporate law (share, shareholders, dividends) and Real Estate Law (freeholder, leaseholder, AST, ground rent, mortgage agreements) and understanding basic mechanics of property contracts in UK will help as you will be dealing with these, and speaking about these with professional clients daily. You should be able to read termsheets and other legal contracts and understand 70-80% of it, and understand all of the commercial terms and know how to ask the right questions to lawyers to get fuller understanding

  • Excellent written and spoken English – You will be interfacing with several large corporate clients and their lawyers, business analysts and accountants – via both emails and regular face to face meetings to secure new business. You will be sending them excel and PowerPoint documents you make, following up with phone calls and face-to-face calls to explain your analysis, refine your analysis and come to successful negotiations. You will work with the Founder on these, and you are expected to be presentable for such meetings, and know how to communicate with such clients and stakeholders

  • Familiarity with Property Markets – having some exposure to property markets – knowing how mortgage brokers, estate agents and leaseholders and freeholders work with some previous experience will be a plus


Who are we looking for:


A developer with “stay hungry, stay foolish” mindset, who has proven track record learning new business fast


You love knowing and learning new technologies and using them towards practical applications and solving real-life problems


The job requires a good attitude towards problem-solving, and working under tight-schedule.


You should aim to work 5 days a week, between our offices in Shoreditch


 


Compensation


£28,000 to £40,000 depending on skillsets and experience along with stock options

items.title: Work From Home Reservation Sales Representative
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=16, c=0, mobile=8, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=8}
items.content:
Overview

Enterprise Holdings is the parent company of multi-billion dollar brands Enterprise Rent-A-Car, Alamo Rent-A-Car, and National Car Rental and is a reputable company as well as an industry leader. We are looking to add virtual Reservation Sales Representatives who are outgoing, sales-minded experts skilled in utilizing effective selling techniques to turn customer calls into confirmed reservations, all while providing the highest level of service for which we're known! Our ideal representatives are able to successfully follow a sales strategy; communicate effectively with a wide range of callers; close the sale, and input detailed information into the appropriate reservation system accurately and efficiently. If you have a passion for sales then this is the opportunity for you!

We work hard and reward hard work! We offer a competitive commission structure on top of our hourly pay of $13.00/hour for employees who meet monthly sales goals. What can you expect? The average representative in this role earns $250/month commission pay, with our top performing agents earning $800+/month!

Schedule Requirements: To best serve the needs of our customers, our remote Reservation Sales team is available until 10:00pm CST. Being able to work an assigned schedule that falls within our operating hours is required and expected. Schedule start times begin between 11am-1:30pm CST. They include working weekends and do not rotate week-to-week. All schedules are full-time and require working 40 hours a week. Once a schedule is assigned it is not negotiable upon completion of training.

Responsibilities

* Sales Representatives must be able to handle 80-100 incoming calls per day and talk with potential customers across multiple states and time zones
* Efficiently guide conversations and apply sales techniques to convert calls into reservations
* Provide excellent customer service to customers
* Maintain a courteous and pleasant demeanor while speaking with external and internal customers
* Strive to exceed sales targets - take appropriate steps to meet monthly personal and department sales goals (based on bookings, revenue, etc.)
* Provide timely and accurate information reflecting a customer-oriented image for the company
* Seek to improve job performance through self-assessment, skill development, training and goal setting
* Follow sales techniques to maximize revenue
* Handle multiple tasks (i.e., talking with customers while accessing information in a computer)
* Maintain, at a minimum, target levels of productivity and performance
* Locate and interpret complex information from a number of databases
* Adapt to the needs of individual callers
* Accept repetitive work tasks performed in a confined work area
* Maintain a regular and reliable level of attendance and punctuality
* Perform miscellaneous job-related duties as assigned

Equal Opportunity Employer/Disability/Veterans

Qualifications

* Must currently live in the state of Ohio
* Must currently live in Youngstown, OH, or the immediate surrounding area (applicants not in the surrounding area will not be considered)
* One year sales experience in a performance/commission-based or metric-driven environment
* Minimum of six months customer service experience
* Call center experience preferred
* Work-related experience working on a personal computer (PC), navigating through multiple computer systems and screens
* Permanent residence with a defined working space that is clean, ventilated, quiet, and free of distractions
* Ability to participate and complete mandatory training for 3 weeks M-F from 9-5:30pm CST
* Ability to complete I-9 work authorization paperwork in person
* Must be willing to work a full time schedule (40 hours/week), with start times between 11am-1:30pm Central Time Zone, including both weekend days (Saturday & Sunday)
* Must be willing to accept a starting pay of $13.00/hour
* Must be authorized to work in the United States and not require work authorization sponsorship by our company for this position now or in the future
* Must be at least 18 years old

Technical Qualifications:

* Must have a computer/PC (No MACs) with compatible OS versions: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, or Windows 10
* Must have a computer USB headset with microphone
* Must have a separate modem
* Must have a stand-alone router with gigabit speed connection via Ethernet cable
* Must have high-speed internet access provided by a cable or fiber provider (no DSL, satellite or wireless)
* Minimum upload speed of 2mbps
* Minimum download speed of 5mbps
* Use of wireless and WiFi \"air cards\" is prohibited
* Applicants must meet all technical qualifications at the time of application.

Qualified candidates must also possess the following:

* Exceptional communication both verbal and written; a good telephone voice, proper English usage, and the ability to \"project\" oneself over the phone are necessary
* Knowledge and understanding of company's principles, policies, procedures and standards
* Ability to apply experience based knowledge and leadership skills toward organizational goals
* Strong sense of initiative, requiring little direct supervision
* Ability to maintain confidential information
* Strong time management and organizational skills
* Comfortable working independently or in a team
* Ability to exercise sound judgment to make decisions toward the objective of satisfying all brands
* Problem solving skills required
* Ability to work with difficult customers in difficult situations
* Strong technical aptitude with the ability to self-troubleshoot
* You will be shipped a VPN phone with a headset and a key fob to the address provided on your application. Equipment may arrive separately.
* Please be sure to verify that your mailing address in our system is an address where you can receive equipment, ensuring there are not delays in receiving your equipment. Make sure you add the apartment number (if any). PO Boxes are not supported and we must have a physical address for you to receive your equipment.
* Enterprise reserves the right to verify that your PC meets or exceeds these requirements.


Associated topics: agent, dealer, gerber, life insurance, outbound, phone, sales representative, telephone, telesales, vacation

items.content:
Salary 100% Commission,

WORK FROM ANYWHERE... We do everything online: Live training 4 times weekly via livestream
presentations, recorded training 24/7 on video, and our client presentations are done via private
web conferences using screen sharing technology.

DO BUSINESS NATIONWIDE ... This virtual model eliminates all the wasted drive time
and no more boring office meetings... you can get a lot more done in a lot less time and
you can expand your territory to the entire United States.

We are the new virtual division the largest Insurance Marketing Organization in the industry,
our parent organization paid out over $730 Million in commissions in 2016. We are that
proven and VERY successful business model into a completely virtual environment with solid
backing from one of the strongest and best known companies in America.

We are seeking experienced sales & recruiting pros as well as sales trainees
You bring the skills, attitudes, and habits of success... We teach you the details.

If you're looking for a job, this is not for you... We pay for RESULTS, not attendance.
But if you're looking for a SYSTEM that can allow you to get to a level of income that just
has not been possible before, then we might be a match.


What we offer...

1. NO LIMITS on your income... be paid what you're really worth.
2. Commission advances, overrides, and bonuses paid twice weekly
3. Great quality of life.. work from anywhere
4 . Flexible hours / Time Freedom... you're the boss
5 . Fun, supportive, and positive team culture
6. Proven SYSTEM that that produced $732 million in commissions & bonuses in 2015
7. Thorough training both live and recorded. Personal mentoring.


Most importantly, an opportunity to make a real difference in people's lives while you
escape the 9-5 rat race and take back control of your life.


What we DON'T do...

1. No cold calling or door-to-door
2. No evening or weekend appointments away from home
3. No wasting time fighting traffic, No boring office meetings, No dress code
4. No quotas or minimums and No micro-managing
5. No corporate favoritism. Promotions based on results, not politics.


Who We Are Looking For...

Our ideal candidate is a self-motivated winner who is HUNGRY and just looking
for the right opportunity, the right team, and the right SYSTEM.

Must have strong communication and \"people skills\", a great attitude, HIGH INTEGRITY,
enjoy helping people, and be willing to follow our proven system and put in the time and
work that we all know is required in order to achieve extraordinary success.


Part time OK if you can put in at least 12 hours/week minimum in income producing activity
plus 3+ hours per week of online training.

This is a 1099 independent contractor position. Income is based on results. Life insurance license
is required, which is easy to get. OK to start while working on your pre-license education.



YOUR NEXT STEP...

If you would like to learn more, your NEXT STEP is to watch our intro video.

If you like what you see, then click the link to request for an initial phone interview to get your
questions answered and to see if we're a match.


TO WATCH THE VIDEO...

  1. Click the green 'APPLY NOW' button on the lower right side of this page
  2. Fill in the brief info form and click SUBMIT
  3. On the next page, click the link to get to our website with the video


We look forward to meeting you on the phone very soon if you would like to discuss the possibilities.


DOUG JONES
Senior Vice President

P.S. As you watch the video, take notes and jot down your questions, then click the NEXT
button below the video to request and initial phone interview so we can get them answered
for you and see if we are a match.

items.title: Remote Inbound Sales - Work At Home
items.content:
Remote Inbound Sales ?? Work at Home

Leverage your sales skills to earn money from home.?

Are you an optimistic problem solver? Do you love using your sales skills to connect people to services and products that help them in their day-to-day lives?? If so, you should learn more about the Arise Paltform, a virtual technology that connects small customer support companies, run by people like you, to prestigious Fortune 500 clients - many who need inbound sales support.

?

Register to use the Arise Platform, and have the freedom to be your own boss!??
  • Be your own boss, and work at home
  • Schedule your work around your life, not the other way around
  • Extra money for holidays or escape the 9-to-5
  • Convert customer contacts into sales by matching the right product or service to the customer?s need
  • Provide consistent, high-quality support to customers from your home
?

Handle problems and provide resolutions that may require follow-up and/or escalation

If you want the pride and reward that comes with running your own business in your own way on your own terms, then running a mini call center offering customer support from home through the Arise Platform is for you.

If you?re not ready to start a business, a great way to gain experience is by working for a call center company that has already registered to use the Arise Platform. It?s?the first?step in gaining knowledge about the industry, and the details of providing services to clients using the Arise Platform, before starting your own company.?Many of the thousands of small call center companies using the Arise Platform are hiring agents.?

Interested in this opportunity?

The registration process is easy! You can be up and running in as little as 3 to 5 days and on your way to making your work from home business dream a reality.

?

Learn more at AriseWorkFromHome.com .

This is not an offer of employment. It is an opportunity to enter into a business-to-business relationship with Arise.?

?

items.content:
Call Center Representative ? Work at Home

?

Make your work from home dream a reality!

Don?t wait another minute!

Use your computer skills ?and sparkling personality to work from home!

Do you want the flexibility and freedom that working from home and being your own boss provides? Are you tired of spending more time on your commute than you do with your family? If so, then you need to register to use the Arise Platform TODAY!

About Arise Virtual Solutions

Arise offers a technology platform that connects small call center companies, run by people like you, to prestigious clients. Arise supplies the clients and platform, and you provide the service and choose your own schedule ? right from the comfort of your home! There are no outbound sales or cold calls.

What does a typical day look like when you are using the Arise Platform to provide service?

Using the Arise Platform to provide service means that you are providing contact center services from home, for some of the largest companies in the world, on a schedule that you set. Need to go to a doctor?s appointment or the gym, or pick your child up from school? That?s not a problem when you are using the Arise platform. You schedule the work in ? hour increments so you can plan your work around your life and not the other way around.

As a call center using the Arise Platform, you will:
  • Handle inbound calls, chats and/or emails
  • Learn about products and services to accurately and efficiently resolve customer inquiries on first contact
  • Document issues, resolution and follow-up actions
Are you ready to be your own boss?

It?s easier than you think. The Arise Platform can help you establish a successful customer support business - right from your own home office ? in just a few short steps.

Not ready to be your own boss just yet - but still want to work from home?

A great way to gain experience is by working for a call center company that has already registered to use the Arise Platform. It?s the first step in gaining knowledge about the industry, and the details of providing services to clients using the Arise Platform, before starting your own company. Many of the thousands of small call center companies using the Arise Platform are hiring agents.

Interested in this opportunity?

The registration process is easy! You can be up and running in as little as 3 to 5 days and on your way to making your work from home business dream a reality.

?

Learn more at AriseWorkFromHome.com

This is not an offer of employment. It is an opportunity to enter in to a business-to-business relationship with Arise.

items.content:
WORK AT HOME - REMOTE POSITIONS - NO COLD CALLING - EARN A BASE SALARY + SALES BONUS + PAID TRAINING AND LICENSING + DAY ONE BENEFITS

Answer Financial, an Allstate company, continues to expand its Remote Insurance Sales Agent program. As a Remote Sales Agent with Answer, you will take inbound calls (no cold calls), offering shoppers the opportunity to compare prices and purchase auto and home insurance from the companies we represent. This is an excellent career position that offers continued growth and opportunity. You must be currently P&C Licensed to apply.

We are one of the largest auto and home insurance agencies in the U.S. Weve got over 20 years of experience in insurance and the backing of our parent company, Allstate Insurance is a competitive space. Answer has thrived by partnering with respected, successful companies. Whether under their brands, our brand, or through a co-branded experience we offer the premier auto and home insurance solution for all customers profiles. Partnering is in our DNA, and we do it better than anyone.

WHAT WE PROVIDE:

* Starting salary $32,000 to $37,000 plus sales bonus
* Paid sales training program
* We cover the costs for ALL licensing
* We provide you with all computer equipment
* Full time positions (not contract), you are employed by Answer Financial Inc.
* Inbound calls NO cold calling
* Benefits available beginning day one

WHAT YOU PROVIDE:

* Successfully complete our 5 week (PAID) online sales training program
* Pass credit and criminal background checks
* Provide dedicated home work space
* Excellent verbal communication skills
* Experienced with technology with ability to pick up new systems and processes quickly

Locations: Answer has opportunities to work from home in a remote capacity. In addition, applicants may choose to relocate to an Answer Sales Center. Answer has three sales centers located in Knoxville, TN; Encino, CA; and Ogden, UT. Relocation to an Answer location is optional and would be the responsibility of the candidate.

Answer Financial, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer


Associated topics: broker, customer, health, insurance agent, insurance sales agent, phone, sales, sales associate, sales position, sell

items.title: Junior Inside Salesperson
items.content:
Junior Inside Salesperson at Janus Worldwide

Remote | Freelance

Janus has a telecommute permanent/contract position available for a Jr. inside sales person located in the US. This Jr. inside salesperson will be assisting our US Sr. Business Development Manager increase our US presence. This position will include cold calling new prospects, generating leads, scheduling meetings, emailing prospects, searching for new contacts and other inside sales-related functions. This position has huge potential, with room for advancement.

Desired skills and experience

  • Successful experience in inside telephone sales; 3+ years, preferred
  • Energetic, positive, with a “can-do” attitude
  • Pleasant phone skills and strong experience in cold calling
  • The ability to present themselves in a professional manner while making outbound calls
  • Proficient with Microsoft Office, Sales Force and other CMS tools
  • Currently working in a telecommute environment
  • Excellent oral and written communication skills
  • Industry experience in translation and localization preferred, but not necessary
Apply for job

items.title: Senior Strategic Planning Advisor - PartTime & Remote
tags: DBG:surround``remot 3N OR(options, avail, allow) NOT encourag
items.content:
Available for conference in Washington DC October 17-29. Remaining work can be done remotely.

Responsibilites:

  • Carry out consultations on the Strategic Planning agenda design with key leaders
  • Review background documents, including past Strategic Planning agendas and documentation, guidance, and other relevant materials
  • Develop and finalize the agenda to include 3-4 full days of business meetings in coordination with Executive Team and Global Programs Team
  • Draft guidance to staff members and specific teams (e.g. sector and/or regional teams)in anticipation of Strategic Planning
  • Prepare for strategic planning and training sessions, which may include document review of staff inputs
  • Facilitate strategic planning and deliver training and team building sessions as agreed upon with the USTDA Executive Team and the Global Programs Team
  • Take comprehensive notes during the Strategic Planning sessions
  • Conduct a follow-up meeting(s) with Executive Team and Global Programs Team to share insights and lessons learned
  • Deliver a substantive report summarizing information presented prior to and during the Strategic Planning sessions, including regional and sector priorities, as well as analysis and
  • recommendations


Qualifications:

  • Possess expertise in strategic planning and/or organizational development demonstrated through education and/or professional experience
  • Experience with conducting/facilitating strategic planning or similar types of meetings for government agencies and/or international organizations
  • Availability to be on-site October 21-25, 2019, the week that USTDA has reserved to conduct its annual strategic planning meetings
  • Must be available to work on-site for up to two cumulative days in the lead-up to and after the conclusion of the week of strategic planning.
  • Contractor must have strong writing skills to draft the Strategic Planning agenda and compose a Final Report detailing the results of the sessions
  • Experience designing strategic planning agendas and/or dynamic sessions to engage employees in discussion and the exchange of ideas
  • Experience facilitating meetings with approximately 100 participants
  • Experience designing and delivering team building exercises that strengthen the effectiveness and ability of an organization to achieve its mission
  • Experience designing and delivering training focused on topics such as strategic thinking, emotional intelligence, collaboration across a diverse work force (DiSC, Myers Briggs, or other equivalent frameworks), highly effective teams, and organizational culture.
  • Professional level skill in both oral and written communication
  • Proficiency with Microsoft products including Word, Excel, PowerPoint, and Outlook
  • Ability to deal tactfully and effectively with persons at all levels of government, private sector and others
- provided by Dice

items.content:
SecurityTrails.com|Sales Development Representative | remote, full-time| https://sthr.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=3 | hello@securitytrails.com

SecurityTrails is looking for a motivated and talented Sales Development Representative to join our growing team. Your primary responsibility is to help turn leads into qualified opportunities by partnering with marketing and sales to create and execute on program and outbound lead generation campaigns. This position requires heavy outbound phone calling, qualification, consultative selling skills and tight collaboration with the Account Executives to generate new opportunities. The SDR will be expected to report on qualification and call activity and stay thoroughly informed on all products and the IT Security industry in general.

Get an insight of our working remote culture https://securitytrails.com/blog/working-remotely !

Join us on https://sthr.bamboohr.com/jobs/view.php?id=7

items.title: Inside Sales Representative
tags: DBG:surround``OR(pacif, pst, pdt, western, california, losangel, sanfrancisco, paloalto, sanmateo) 3W OR(time,timezon)
items.content:
Inside Sales Representative at ActivityHero

Remote | Entry-level | Freelance | Part-time

ActivityHero is the leading marketplace to help parents find and book children’s activities (a $33B market for after school classes and camps). Our solution helps activity providers reach more students, get paid, and save administrative time. We are expanding to new areas and this sales team will be reaching businesses in new cities. Remote candidates who are able to work between 9am – 5pm Pacific Time will be considered.

Duties and Responsibilities:

  • Sales reps will be responsible for calling prospective businesses and upselling ActivityHero marketing and registration services
  • Learn about ActivityHero services and the pain points of class and camp providers
  • Research and build new account lists
  • Achieve weekly and monthly quotas of new customers
  • Maintain detailed record of phone calls and emails in Salesforce

Qualifications:

  • Bachelor’s degree
  • 1-4 years sales experience is required. For example: (telesales, inside sales, sales development, or account management experience)
  • Excellent communication skills, both oral and written
  • Tech sales experience is a plus but not required
  • Knowledge of the camp and after school program industry is preferred
  • Experience with small businesses is a plus
  • Experience with CRM software (preferably Salesforce)
  • High activity sales, high sales transaction environment, including high call volume, pipeline growth, and opportunity generation
  • Demonstrated ability to conduct cold calls and find the right contacts

Additional details: This is a contractor position and you can work from home. Must commit to 30-40 hours per week and have high speed internet access and computer.

Apply for job

items.title: Human Resources Advisor
items.content:
Human Resources Advisor at ThinkHR

Remote

PORTLAND, OR

OPERATIONS – HOTLINE

FULL-TIME

Are you an HR professional that enjoys leaving work at work? If yes, we have a team for you!

**Open to remote applicants**

The right candidate is well versed in general HR and has in-depth experience with a great desire to serve and support others in maintaining compliance, handling employee relation matters, and advising on best practice solutions. Ideally, you are a good listener and astute with research tools, able to read others and adjust your communication style, as well as collaborate with your peers. If you are the person that people call first to explain complex HR topics in plain English terms, we are interested in getting to know you better.

  • ThinkHR provides a welcoming culture of Love, Innovation, and Passion and strives to change the game in HR compliance and best practice solutions for brokers and businesses nationwide.
  • If you are customer focused, well versed in HR, and a game changer, we have a place for you in our On-Demand HR Live Team.
  • Our team provides email and phone support to an average of over 360 businesses daily with general HR questions ranging from compensation and benefits, to compliance and employee relation issues.
  • This unique role allows you to make an impact for different clients each day with no dedicated group of clients to manage.
  • You will provide the team with your exceptional value by presenting strong verbal and written communication skills, an ability to problem solve through research, collaboration, and retention of knowledge, and a demonstrated ability to consult with executives, business owners, and others with confidence and a solid business acumen.
  • We are interested in every qualified candidate who is eligible to work in the United States. However, we are not able to sponsor Visas.

You will:

  • Research and disseminate HR and benefits related information to clients at their request.
  • In-take client calls and questions using proprietary case management system.
  • Provide problem-solving assistance, compliance and best practice guidance.
  • Keep current on federal and state laws to provide best guidance to our clients.

You are/have

  • 4 or more years of consultative experience within Human Resources, multi-state experience strongly preferred.
  • Demonstrated familiarity with the legal and regulatory environment impacting HR related topics
  • Savvy use of technology including research tools, the internet and the ability to manage within several programs at a time.
  • PHR/SPHR or SHRM-CP/SHRM-SCP certification
  • Outstanding written and verbal communication skills
  • Broad knowledge and experience in the administration and management of benefits, employee relations, leaves of absence, performance and discipline, recruiting and hiring, terminations, wage and hour compliance, workplace safety including workers’ compensation, and others
  • Experience within PEO or insurance brokerage, a plus
Apply for job

Part time OK if you can put in at least 12 hours/week minimum in income producing activity
plus 3+ hours per week of online training.

This is a 1099 independent contractor position.? Income is based on results.? Life insurance license
is required, which is easy to get. OK to start while working on your pre-license education.



YOUR NEXT STEP...

If you would like to learn more, your NEXT STEP is to watch our intro video.

If you like what you see, then click the link to request for an initial phone interview to get your
questions answered and to see if we're a match.


TO WATCH THE VIDEO...

  1. Click the green 'APPLY NOW' button on the lower right side of this page
  2. Fill in the brief info form and click SUBMIT
  3. On the next page, click the link to get to our website with the video


We look forward to meeting you on the phone very soon if you would like to discuss the possibilities.


DOUG JONES
Senior Vice President

?

P.S.?? As you watch the video, take notes and jot down your questions, then click the NEXT
???????? button below the video to request and initial phone interview so we can get them answered
???????? for you and see if we are a match.
?

by Jobble

Location: London


 


VRtuoso is looking for a full-time B2B Sales Consultant and for a full-time B2B Sales Manager who are excited about technology advancements, and able to sell to CxO/Director level within enterprise accounts.


 


VRtuoso is the first Virtual Reality (VR) solution of its kind, which is helping to democratise such technology across large enterprise businesses.


VRtuoso is a rapidly growing company with offices in Italy, UK and USA, leading enterprise virtual reality Training and Sales & Marketing. Find out more about us online or by reaching out to us.


 


Requirements:


- Experience in the Learning & Development (L&D) / HR sector


- Experience in planning and implementing sales strategies.


 


Key role responsibilities include:


- Engaging CxO/Director level executives


- Developing relationships with potential clients to grow your own portfolio of clientele, leading to account management


- Meet and exceed sales revenue targets including weekly KPIs and managing a healthy sales pipeline


- Ability to lead technical demo within the sales pitch


 


We offer working from home as well as our buzzing TechHub office, as this is a field-based sales role.


 


Become a valued member of our rapidly growing team, make your mark on the industry and want to be rewarded for your effort!


 


Salary: £30,000.00 to £65,000.00 /year


 


If you meet the mandatory requirements send your cv to jobs@vrtuoso.io with the subject line “L&D sales”

items.title: Sales Associate (Part Time)
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=8, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=5}
items.content:
About MyTutor


One-to-one tuition is proven to significantly improve pupils’ grades, confidence and life chances. Yet it remains out of reach for many. MyTutor’s mission is to bring life-changing tuition to all. Our handpicked network of tutors work online with pupils from all walks of life, and we’ve given over a quarter of a million lessons so far – raising results on average by one whole grade. We’re proud of the fact that over 400 schools have also chosen to work with us. And that we’ve earned a Trustpilot rating of 9.4/10.


We understand the hectic lives of families with teenagers, and our flexible lesson times mean parents can juggle schedules more easily. On our website, it’s simple to find a tutor your child gets on with – and every lesson is tailored to their needs. Also, by having lessons via live video, pupils can access the best tutors no matter where they live or when they need help. No travelling for Mum and Dad, no waiting around, no strangers in your home. Pupils can have their lessons anywhere – at Grandma’s, at a friend’s house or on holiday, so there’s no disruption in the run-up to exams.


Tuition is now more affordable and accessible, making life less stressful for busy parents doing their best.


 


About the role


You’ll be joining our passionate, ambitious team in an exciting, fast-paced & high-growth environment. We pride ourselves on an amazing customer experience at MyTutor with over 95% of our reviews  at 5* and some great feedback on Trustpilot.  As a Sales Associate,  you will be responsible for contacting parents and helping them get started with a tutor on the platform. No previous experience working in education is necessary; we have amazing in-house specialists and top talent from the industry to train you! 


 


What you’ll do



  • Contact parents - who have created an account but who have not booked a tutor - via phone, email and live chat 

  • Pitch our service and help match the parent with a tutor for an introductory Free Meeting 

  • Build relationships with your leads and advise them on how to get started on MyTutor

  • Follow up with previously matched parents and act as an account manager to help them book their first lesson 

  • Identify opportunities to improve operational efficiency and provide feedback on trends and patterns of parent requests 

  • Work with the Customer Experience Manager to continuously iterate on communication and processes, to ensure we are providing the best service for parents, and the best results for the business

  • Collaborate with the rest of the team to meet targets and support each other

  • Work flexible shifts covering a variety of early mornings (7.30am-10am), evenings (5pm-8pm) and weekends (Saturday and Sunday, 9am-12pm and 4pm-7pm)


Requirements



  • You love the idea of helping parents find the perfect tutor to help their child succeed

  • You have previous experience in sales and/or customer-centric roles

  • You’re an excellent communicator who is at ease empathising with customer needs and feels driven to help others

  • You’re happy to adapt a sales script to fit each call you make - ensuring that any questions and concerns from parents are addressed

  • You’re able to feedback collaboratively and effectively across teams

  • You’re comfortable using a laptop/PC and are open to learning how to use our backend sales CMS system

  • You are able to work efficiently with the team to achieve team targets, whilst ensuring attention to detail and quality of service


 


Benefits



  • Helping to improve the educational outcomes of thousands of young people

  • A work atmosphere that encourages collaboration and support

  • Opportunity to work autonomously and make use of your creative flair

  • Training and investment in your learning

  • £10 an hour base rate, with competitive commission based on results

  • Team training days and flexible working hours


 


MyTutor is committed to creating an inclusive workplace and have set up our own EDI (Equality, Diversity and Inclusion) committee who host regular events to make sure we live up to those values. We are proud to be an equal opportunity employer, and all applicants will be considered.


 


To apply


Get in touch with your CV and let us know why you’re interested in working with us.

items.content:
Beta Analytic

Account Managers for Europe - Freelancer Based in Europe Beta Analytic


EU-only
**Company Description**
Beta Analytic is a dedicated radiocarbon dating laboratory for archaeologists, geologists and hydrologists. It also tests the renewable carbon content of various liquid, gaseous and solid materials for greenhouse gas and biobased/biofuel monitoring programs. Its sole mission is to provide academic and industrial researchers with highly accurate radiocarbon dating results within the quoted delivery time.

We are looking for self-motivated individuals to help assist in our customer service and business development efforts with current and potential Scandinavian, French & German clients, which include universities, scientific researchers and archaeological institutions. Communications are over the phone and via email as well as periodic attendance at conferences. The candidates must be available during business hours and based in Europe.

Excellent command / highly proficient in spoken and written English is required.

Excellent command / highly proficient in spoken and written French is required for the position for the French market.

Excellent command / highly proficient in spoken and written German is required for the position for the German market.

**Role and Responsibilities**

*Business Development / Prospecting*
Contribute to the growth of your local region in terms of samples and new clients
Contribute to strategy & adapt global sales strategy to your local region
Obtain and follow up on referrals from cold calls and conversations with clients
Prospecting activities
Represent Beta at conferences
Monitor news, tenders and national projects and follow up accordingly

*Account Management*
Build relationships with key contacts to develop business at major accounts in your region
Use data analysis to track sample submittal trends - follow up with clients to resolve any issues and fill up the pipeline
Gather market intel (industry trends, competitors, regulations) and report to management/follow up with prospects accordingly
Customer Support and Consultation
Take care of incoming inquiries/emails
Follow up on results
Escalate recommendations for improvement in processes and user interface based on customer experience
Effective management of productivity, goals, workload and schedule
Stay up-to-date with research fields, Beta resources and technical developments in the lab and industry

*Account Manager - Skill Set*
Discipline, autonomy, motivation, and drive
Accountability: true to word, takes action and accepts responsibility
Effective at Initiating / Maintaining relationships and building mutual trust
Can engage a prospect and lead decision-making process
Intellectual curiosity and grasp of technical topics
Good communicator with a highly professional manner - telephone and email
Consultative style / customer service orientation
Demonstrates logical thinking and problem-solving skills
Can follow processes and accepts direction
Adaptability: Open to challenge, growth, change
Positive outlook and can do attitude

Following an initial trial period, this could grow into a long-term position. This is a telecommuting position on a freelance basis.

For more information on our company please go to www.radiocarbon.com and www.betalabservices.com

Please send your resume and cover letter in English.

Job Type: Full-time



#Location
- EU-only

Before we can continue being one of the strongest competitors in the market, we need to hire a well-rounded Account Executive that not only can sell, sell, sell but can also maintain relationships with clients that we currently oversee.

if you enjoy managing client relationships and have experience with SaaS sales or field sales please apply today!

– 3+ years sales experience, preferably in SaaS or large Enterprises

– Client management / relationship management

What’s In It for You

– Competitive Salary and Aggressive Commissions Policy
– Medical, Dental, and Vision
– lots more

So, if you are a Enterprise Account Executive with experience, please apply today!

You can email me directly at Jeff.Steadman@cybercoders.com

This job is open to telecommute candidates.

Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.

Preferred Skills

  • SaaS
  • Prospecting
  • Full Cycle Sales
  • Account Management
  • Sales
  • C-Suite
  • Vertical Sales

items.title: Customer Acquisition Manager (SMEs)
tags: DBG:surround``OR(locat, base, resid) 3W OR(berlin, london, pari)
DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=8, ruby=0, apple=0, java=0, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Location


Based in London but will require regular travel across the UK and Europe.


Description


We want to give people the freedom to access the world’s best work spaces, anywhere, any time, at the touch of a button. 


We’re looking for a positive, energetic, natural sales-person to grow our community of SME users (freelancers, startups, and small teams). 


About Us


Desana gives people access to a network of great work space when they want it, where they want it, through a single monthly subscription.


We’re a growing startup based between London, Edinburgh, and Stockholm. We aim to become a globally relevant company by disrupting the way people think about, and access, the places they work. We're looking for the best people to join us on our journey.


With prior experience in startups ourselves, we’re keen to do things the right way from the very start. That’s why we believe in openness and transparency in everything we do, from salary to communications, to processes.


The Role


We’re passionate about building the best possible customer on-boarding experience. We’re not passionate about incessant cold-calls and unrealistic sales targets.


Sales



  • Defining, establishing, growing, and optimising effective consumer considerate B2B and B2C sales channels. 

  • Identifying and building relationships with leads within each channel.

  • Successfully onboarding customers to our platform, taking time to manually support their needs as necessary.

  • Recognising differences in customer needs, building and implementing effective systems to support consumer groups. Continuously optimising these systems.

  • Working with the team to prepare marketing materials that will help you to successfully onboard customers. 

  • Spend time identifying potential partnership opportunities through which customers can be reached. Nurturing those opportunity relationships for long-term mutual benefit.

  • Presenting engaging and informative sales updates / strategies to the rest of the team. 

  • Attending national and international industry events to better understand our industry and to meet prospective customers.

  • Creating and delivering result orientated “sprints” (short, task defined projects) that are aligned with the company’s 6 and 12 month goals.


Communication



  • Working directly with space relationship managers (and the rest of the team) to incessantly improve customer experience. 

  • Regular monitoring and updating of our task management system.

  • Participate in the daily whole team “stand up” call, wherever you are.


Industry Awareness



  • Consistently develop wider awareness of customer segment needs; meticulous attention to specific needs of customers. 

  • Staying on top of industry news and trends; be able to identify and respond to micro-indicators of change.


Relavtionship Management



  • Managing and nurturing relationships with stakeholders, customer groups, and individuals. 

  • Encourage everyone to get the best out of the platform (and help them), so that we can develop the best possible customer experience. 


About You



  • You have demonstrable sales experience: preferably in building face-to-face, long-lasting relationships with different customer segment groups. You should be able to demonstrate that you’ve applied effective on-boarding systems to previous sales roles and that you understand where there may be scope for optimisation.

  • You have CRM experience. We use Hubspot, but anything else is fine too.

  • You’re personable: a fun, enthusiastic people-person that finds joy in connecting with and learning from others.

  • You can communicate diligently: you understand the importance of maintaining regular communication with our customers and those that you are working to onboard, while never being too pushy.

  • You’re never be complacent: you strive to recognise that things can always be better than they currently are and have the confidence to present solutions to any weaknesses or inefficiencies that you see.

  • You’re driven: you should be self-starting and enjoy having autonomy (with accountability to the rest of the team), able to manage your own time and effectively plan your day to day activities and consistently maintain customer interactions in our CRM database.

  • You have a growth mindset: a desire to grow both personally and professionally.

  • You have grit: resilience and desire to work in a startup and know when to seize the right opportunities in a fast-paced environment, while working to exceed our customers expectations / demands.

  • You have a good network: if you have a good contact base in the UK property sector, that would be extremely useful but not essential.


Desana Benefits 



  • We’ll pay you fairly to match your experience and we’re establishing complete salary transparency across the company with clear progression paths.

  • Team drinks, events and trips.

  • Share options in the business.

  • Free access to the app and our network of workspaces.

  • Flexible and remote work hours with a strong focus on work-life balance.


 


Think you're the right person for the role? Send us your CV and a brief cover letter and tell us why :)

items.content:
Welcome !

We are an exciting London based creative tech agency. We provide digital solutions for our clients through web & app development. We have a creative team of animators, computer geeks, I.T geniuses and tech enthusiast.

Currently maintaining strong client relationships is the backbone to what makes Jelingu thrive as an agency and an essential element of our brand.


Job Post
Client account manager internship

As a client account manager you would be responsible for managing your own portfolio of clients and maintaining company account relationships.


Typical work activities

Serve as the lead point of contact for all customer account management matters Build and maintain strong, long-lasting client relationships Negotiate contracts and close agreements to maximize profits Develop trusted advisor relationships with key accounts, customer stakeholders and executive sponsors Ensure the timely and successful delivery of our solutions according to customer needs and objectives Clearly communicate the progress of monthly/quarterly initiatives to internal and external stakeholders Develop new business with existing clients and/or identify areas of improvement to meet sales quotas Forecast and track key account metrics (e.g. quarterly sales results and annual forecasts) Prepare reports on account status Collaborate with sales team to identify and grow opportunities within territory


Requirements
• Exemplary planning and time management skills
• High level verbal and written communications skills
• Good understanding of building relationships
• We love people that can bring forward fresh ideas
• Creativity
• Brilliant people person and communications skills
• Keen to learn and grow with the company
• Business savvy

If you feel you meet the criteria for this intern position we would love to hear from you. This intern position is flexible and we have long-term career opportunities for the right candidate.

The majority of this position will be working remotely with occasional team/client meetings.

items.title: Business Development Lead
items.content:
DUSK is London's leading nightlife platform - we make it easy for you to find your new favourite bar, it's curated daily keep to you in the loop with all the latest openings and most hyped places - we then partner with bars to offer our users free drinks.

We work with brands from Diageo to Brewdog to make it possible for them to sponsor free drinks in our partner bars. DUSK has got the plug on over 2500 venues from indies through to larger nationals, making it easy for brands to get drinks into millennial hands.

What you'll be doing?

We need a sales rep to help us grow our venue list and develop relationships in Londons best bars.

You'll create a sales pipeline, lead negotiations with customers to bring about strong, mutually beneficial partnership agreements and execute on sales. You'll be our first full-time sales manager - you will have support from the founder but will take responsibility for everything in the sales funnel.

Who you are?

• Self-motivated & passionate about our business
• Very outgoing & social
• Resourceful
• Gift of the gab
• Great communication skills, both verbal & written
• Ability to work under pressure (We are an early stage startup and we need someone who can knuckle down and work)
• Creativity to think up innovative ways to sell our product.

What you'll get?

• Freedom to get creative on how we sell
• Work closely with the Founder
• Clear targets and see how your work is benefiting
• Unlimited drinks on DUSK
• 10% commission

items.title: Highly skilled SaaS salesperson
tags: DBG_TECH1:techWeightMap:{python=0, other=0, dotnet=0, c=0, mobile=0, go=0, nodejs=0, bigdata-ml=0, ruby=0, apple=0, java=8, gamedev=0, php=0, embedded=0, frontend=0}
items.content:
Most experienced SaaS sales professionals have participated in a sales training programme at one point in their careers. Famous sales methodologies like MEDDIC, Value Selling and others, have been adopted by thousands of software organisations throughout the world to help sales teams ultimately deliver better results, sometimes to good effect.

What often happens though, is that salespeople have forgettable experiences with these programmes and whilst they may show initial enthusiasm, it is common to see a new methodology rigorously followed for a few months, before disappearing out of sight and mind forever.

Todays selection of programmes offer valuable learning, but the delivery of programmes can be a poor experience. Trainings are often much too generic, and almost never align with the unique challenges SaaS businesses face, such as preparing for rapid scale, or future acquisition.

SAASco seeks a successful SaaS salesperson to help build a better way for companies to implement successful sales methodologies, process and training, by compiling unique programmes which align with business goals and revolutionise the sales function.

The perfect co-founder will have experienced great success working with hyper-growth SaaS businesses in a sales capacity - experience of closing six figure deals is essential but seven figure deals will be preferable.

Remote working is welcomed but US or UK based persons would be preferred for proximity to SaaS hubs.

items.title: Account Manager
items.content:
Monday.vc

 

Account Manager


Worldwide
[FULL JOB DESCRIPTION HERE](https://docs.google.com/document/d/13L9L311RIqdtwZR_mNNweR-WVA0bHa-sH9Z5LO8q5qk/edit#heading=h.nyujfk6gjrd0)

Monday.vc is looking for an early/mid career sales-oriented operator to join our early stage, fast growing team.

You’d be responsible for driving revenue and building on momentum by adding new clients to our network of 100+ top venture funds, membership organizations, and accelerators including Union Square Ventures, RRE, and Techstars ([here’s an example](jobs.usv.com)).

**Location:** Remote

**This is an excellent next career step if you want to:**
* Build an amazing network in the venture capital industry
* Shadow serial entrepreneurs to learn what it’s like to start and grow a company
* Work remotely for a company with an intentional, healthy remote culture
* Earn uncapped incentives based on your performance
* Find yourself constantly thinking about better ways to make the right connections / introductions
* Take on a role that provides the runway to grow into significant responsibility and leadership in areas of the business that align with your interests and strengths

**What We Do**
We imagine a world where everyone is energized to start their week fully aligned with their work. The best jobs (and hires!) are found through relationships and trust, so we build tools that increase efficiency for the world’s most valuable networks.

**How We Work**
We’re a scrappy team of entrepreneurs from all over the world who have come together to create a culture we’re proud of. We work remotely because we believe that the best talent shouldn’t be constrained by borders. To compensate for our physical distance, we bring intention to our communication in both structure and content.

**Where We've Been**
* June 2016: Started as a spin-out from a previous startup, ReWork (acquired).
* January 2017: Joined Techstars Boulder
* August 2017: Launched Job Board product
* May 2018: Launched Talent Network product
* September 2018: Crossed 100 paying clients
* December 2018: Grew to 6 team members; Bootstrapped +300% revenue from 2017 to 2018
* June 2019: 10 team members all over the world, 180 paying clients

# Responsibilities
**What We’re Looking For**
You are an early/mid career sales operator who is excited to grow and quickly contribute in these areas of our business:

**Revenue Generation**
* At least 2-3 years of relevant SaaS sales experience closing leads from initial sales conversation to signed contract.
* Building lists of new potential customers and reaching out through diverse channels.
* Developing channel partnerships through networks and industry influencers.
* Improving quality of sales collateral and online assets.
* Improving scalability of sales process in partnership with product and operations teams.

**Client Success**
* Owning and maintaining customer relationships to ensure satisfaction and retention.
* Providing support and mentorship to customers by demonstrating knowledge of products, services, and best practices.
* Advocating internally for client needs and feature requests.

**What Makes This Opportunity Different**
* **Traction; **we have steady inbound leads, case studies in multiple markets, scaleable products, and 98% customer retention.
* **Healthy Team Dynamics;** we’ve run remote companies for our whole careers and understand what it takes to establish healthy remote working dynamics.
